name: Service Properties Trust
description: Service Properties Trust (SVC) is a real estate investment trust (REIT) that primarily focuses on acquiring and owning hotels and other properties used for hospitality services. Founded in 1998 and headquartered in Newton, Massachusetts, SVC operates in the lodging sector and is committed to generating attractive returns for its shareholders through a diverse portfolio of properties. The company primarily invests in hotels that are operated under well-known brands, partnering with leading hotel management companies to enhance operational efficiency and guest experience. SVC's properties include select-service and extended-stay hotels, as well as various facilities that cater to the growing demand for travel and tourism. The company aims to strategically expand its portfolio while maintaining a strong balance sheet and providing consistent cash flow to its investors. Additionally, SVC actively engages in sustainability initiatives to reduce its environmental impact and improve the overall quality of its properties. As the hospitality industry continues to evolve post-pandemic, Service Properties Trust is well-positioned to capitalize on recovery trends and changing consumer preferences.
